statements: SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM trending_topics WHERE hashtag = 'technology';
SELECT topic_name, hashtag, post_timestamp FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_id = 3;
SELECT topic_name, post_timestamp FROM trending_topics WHERE post_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trending_topics ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic_name, hashtag FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_id > 100 ORDER BY topic_name ASC
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM trending_topics WHERE hashtag LIKE '%data%'
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE post_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT topic_name, COUNT(topic_name) AS topic_count FROM trending_topics GROUP BY topic_name HAVING topic_count > 1 ORDER BY topic_count DESC
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_name, topic_hashtag FROM trending_topics ORDER BY topic_id DESC;
SELECT topic_name FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_hashtag = 'tech';
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content WHERE topic_id = 2;
SELECT content_id, content FROM user_generated_content ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_id = 3;
SELECT topic_name, topic_hashtag FROM trending_topics ORDER BY topic_name DESC;
SELECT content_id, content, topic_name FROM user_generated_content JOIN trending_topics ON user_generated_content.topic_id = trending_topics.topic_id;
SELECT topic_id, topic_name, topic_hashtag FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content WHERE topic_id = 2 ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_name, topic_description FROM trending_topics WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, content, user_id FROM user_generated_content ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT hashtag_name FROM hashtags WHERE trending_topic_id = 'abc123';
SELECT trending_topic_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM hashtags GROUP BY trending_topic_id;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_name = 'Technology';
SELECT id, topic_name, created_at FROM trending_topics WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, topic_description, created_at FROM trending_topics WHERE created_at < '2022-01-31' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT hashtag_name, topic_name FROM hashtags JOIN trending_topics ON hashtags.trending_topic_id = trending_topics.id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_content FROM user_generated_content GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_content > 10 ORDER BY total_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics;
SELECT topic_name, tweet_count FROM trending_topics WHERE tweet_count > 100;
SELECT hashtag, tweet_content FROM trending_tweets ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(tweet_id) AS tweet_count FROM user_tweets GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_followers WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics ORDER BY topic_name DESC;
SELECT hashtag, tweet_count FROM trending_topics WHERE tweet_count > 100 ORDER BY tweet_count DESC;
SELECT tweet_content, timestamp FROM user_tweets WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT tweet_content, hashtag FROM trending_tweets WHERE topic_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(follower_id) AS followers_count FROM user_followers GROUP BY user_id HAVING followers_count > 100 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM hashtags;
SELECT hashtag_name FROM hashtags ORDER BY hashtag_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, hashtag_id FROM post_hashtags WHERE post_id = 3 AND hashtag_id = 2;
SELECT hashtag_name FROM hashtags ORDER BY hashtag_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM post_hashtags JOIN hashtags ON post_hashtags.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT topic_name FROM trending_topics WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
